name: Neat Receipt Folder File
summary: Learn about .NRX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To import a NRX file into Neat 5, select Import â†’ Neat File..., click "Browse," navigate to your NRX file, and click Open.
NOTE: The NRX file is similar to .NRT and .NRF files, which are used by older versions of Neat.

description: Receipt folder file created by NeatWorks, a digital document organizing application; contains an exported copy of a Neat receipt folder of scanned receipts that can be shared between Neat users; replaced by Neat 5's .NDX extension.
